info.title: IFPA API
info.description:
This API allows you to extra data out of the IFPA Database and contains information about Players, Tournaments and Rankings
 ### If you are using /v1 or /v2 endpoints, please switch to the current endpoints. These versions are no longer supported or updated.
 ### Release Notes (2.1) : 
	- 2025-08-11 - Updated tournament /results and /{id} info to reflect correct fields
	- 2025-08-01 - Updated this document to OpenAPI 3 
	- 2025-08-01 - Added missing fields and structures
	- 2025-08-01 - Added logic to better support upper and lower case with attributes that are passed.

get.summary: Get information about Tournament Directors
get.description: Returns data about Tournament Directors

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Director

404.description: Cannot find a director with the provided ID

get.summary: Get information about past or future tournaments for a director
get.description: Get information about past or future tournaments for a director

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the director

parameters.name: time_period
parameters.description: Past or Future tournaments (past, future)

404.description: Cannot find a director with the provided ID

get.summary: Get a list of players who are country directors for the IFPA
get.description: Get a list of players who are country directors for the IFPA

get.summary: Search for Directors by Name
get.description: Search for Directors by Name

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the Director (not case sensitive)

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of results to return (default = 50)

get.summary: Get a list of Countries that can referenced by IFPA data
get.description: Get a list of Countries that can referenced by IFPA data

get.summary: Get a list of States and Provinces that can referenced by IFPA data
get.description: Get a list of States and Provinces that can referenced by IFPA data  (US, Canada and Australia only)

get.summary: Get Player Information for Multiple Players
get.description: Returns information on the player based on the IDs provide (limit 50)

parameters.name: players
parameters.description: ID of the players, comma delimited

get.summary: Get Player Information
get.description: Returns information on the player based on the ID Provided

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the player

get.summary: Get High Level PVP Information
get.description: Returns PVP records against other players

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the player

404.description: Cannot find a player with the provided ID

get.summary: Get High Level PVP Information
get.description: Returns PVP records against other players

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the 1st player to compare

parameters.name: id2
parameters.description: ID of the 2nd player to compare

404.description: Cannot find a player with the provided ID

get.summary: Gets ranking and rating history for the player
get.description: Returns ranking and rating history for the player

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the player

404.description: Cannot find a player with the provided ID

get.summary: Get tournament results for a player
get.description: Returns tournament results for a player based on the ranking system provided (main, women, youth)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the player

parameters.name: ranking_system
parameters.description: ranking system

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: type of result. active, nonactive, inactive

400.description: Invalid Player ID or Rank System provided

404.description: Cannot find player or ranking system data

get.summary: Search for players
get.description: Returns a list of players based on specific criteria

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the player (not case sensitive)

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country Name or 2-digit code

parameters.name: stateprov
parameters.description: 2 digit State or Providence Code

parameters.name: tournament
parameters.description: Name of tournament that a player may have played in. Partial Strings are accepted

parameters.name: tourpos
parameters.description: The position the player finished in

get.summary: Ranking of Players who are under the age of 18
get.description: Ranking of Players who are under the age of 18

parameters.name: start_pos
parameters.description: Starting Position within results (for pagination)

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: How many Results to return

get.summary: Ranking of Players who play in tournament submitted to the WPPR System
get.description: Ranking of Players who play in tournament submitted to the WPPR System

parameters.name: start_pos
parameters.description: Starting Position within results (for pagination)

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: How many Results to return

get.description: Ranking of Players who play in tournament submitted to the WPPR System

parameters.name: start_pos
parameters.description: Starting Position within results (for pagination)

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: How many Results to return

get.summary: Players ranked in the Women's ranking system based on Open Events
get.description: RankingPlayers ranked in the Women's ranking system based on Open Events

parameters.name: start_pos
parameters.description: Starting Position within results (for pagination)

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: How many Results to return

parameters.name: tournament_type
parameters.description: The type of tournament that are used in the rankings

get.summary: Ranking Players in the Pro System
get.description: Ranking Players in the Pro System

parameters.name: ranking_system
parameters.description: System to get results for (open, women)

get.summary: Ranking of Players based on the Country they are from
get.description: Ranking of Players based on the Country they are from

parameters.name: start_pos
parameters.description: Starting Position within results (for pagination)

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: How many Results to return

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country Name or Code to show (e.g. US, CA, NZ)

get.summary: Get a list of regions that are being tracked
get.description: Get a list of regions that are being tracked

parameters.description: Code for the Series

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: Speific Year for the Series (defaults to current year)

get.summary: Get the tournaments for a player for a given region
get.description: Get the tournaments for a player for a given region

parameters.name: series_code
parameters.description: Code for the Series

parameters.name: player_id
parameters.description: Player ID to fetch

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: Which year of the series to lookup (default is current year)

parameters.name: region_code
parameters.description: Which region to get the player's card from (e.g. OH)

parameters.name: rank_type
parameters.description: Pull stats for specific ranking types. Default is OPEN

get.summary: List of top 25 tournaments based on tournament value
get.description: List of top 25 tournaments based on tournament value

parameters.name: major
parameters.description: Set to 'N' to exclude Major Tournaments [default is 'Y']

parameters.name: rank_type
parameters.description: Pull stats for specific ranking types. Default is OPEN

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: Filters to specific countries

get.summary: List of players with total accumulative points
get.description: List of players with total accumulative points over a period of time (default 1 year)

parameters.name: rank_type
parameters.description: Pull stats for specific ranking types. Default is OPEN

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: Filters to specific countries

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start Date of period range

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date of period range

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Total number to of records to return

get.summary: List of players with total accumulative events
get.description: List of players with total accumulative events over a period of time (default 1 year)

parameters.name: rank_type
parameters.description: Pull stats for specific ranking types. Default is OPEN

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: Filters to specific countries

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start Date of period range

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End Date of period range

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Total number to of records to return

type.example: Events attended over a period of time

get.summary: Overall WPPR Stats
get.description: Collection of stats about the WPPR System

parameters.name: system_code
parameters.description: Pull stats for specific ranking types. Default is OPEN

get.summary: List of tournament formats that IFPA endorses
get.description: List of tournament formats that IFPA endorses

get.summary: Find a Tournament by ID
get.description: Returns information regarding a specific Tournament

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Tournament

404.description: Cannot find a Tournament with the provided ID

get.summary: List of events related to the tournament provided
get.description: List of events related to the tournament provided

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Tournament

404.description: Cannot find a Tournament with the provided ID

get.summary: Results for a tournament
get.description: Returns detailed results regarding a specific Tournament

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Tournament

404.description: Cannot find a Tournament with the provided ID

get.summary: League Information
get.description: Returns information about Past, Current and Future Leagues.

parameters.name: time_period
parameters.description: Time Period for the League

get.summary: Search for Tournaments or Leagues
get.description: Returns information about tournaments and leagues based on the parameters provided

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Search based on text string against Tournament Names

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Search based on the Country of the Tournament

parameters.name: stateprov
parameters.description: Search based on the State/Provience/Region of the Tournament

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Narrow search to only include results beyond a date. If used, end_date is required

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Narrow search to only include results up to a certain date

parameters.name: rank_type
parameters.description: Search only calendar entries for specific ranking systems

parameters.name: event_type
parameters.description: Search only calendar entries for specific event type

parameters.name: start_pos
parameters.description: Start a specific position in the list that is returned. Default is position

parameters.name: total
parameters.description: Total number of calendar entries to return

parameters.name: director_name
parameters.description: Narrow search to only include tournaments for a particular director

parameters.name: pre_registration
parameters.description: Narrow search to only include tournaments that requires preregistration

parameters.name: only_with_results
parameters.description: Narrow search to only include tournaments that have submitted results

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Narrow search to a region, based on latitude and longitude with radius and distance unit

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Narrow search to a region, based on latitude and longitude with radius and distance unit

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Narrow search to a region, based on latitude and longitude with radius and distance unit

parameters.name: distance_unit
parameters.description: Narrow search to a region, based on latitude and longitude with radius and distance unit

parameters.name: min_points
parameters.description: Minimum Number of Points a Tournament must be worth

parameters.name: max_points
parameters.description: Maximum Number of Points a Tournament can be worth

parameters.name: point_filter
parameters.description: Flag to indicate the search should use the points range values

404.description: Cannot find any Tournaments based on the parameters provided
